name: Pelagiad
body:
### Pelagiad for TrueType
Pelagiad is a font inspired by Magic Cards and EF Medieva. Pelagiad is designed for use in the OpenMW game engine, but can be used for any purpose. Pelagiad is availible under the Creative Commons License.

### License
Pelagiad is licensed under Creative Commons. This means that you can use the font, modify it and distribute it as you will, provided you follow these terms: "Attribution â€” You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use."
In addition I ask, but don't require, that you let the same rules apply to your modifications of this font.

### Instructions
Pelagiad comes with the appropiate files required to use it with OpenMW, and to do so simply copy the files "Pelagiad.ttf" and "openmw-font.xml" into the resources/mygui directory of your OpenMW installation. 

To use the font as a regular font, simply install the ttf file as you would any other font.

The Pelagiad.sfd file is a FontForge project file and can be ignored unless you mean to modify the font.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
